content: a delicate lace smoke ring to protect yourself from wind knitted with less than a skein of malabrigo lace a quick knit to indulge yourself or some beloved ones the smoke ring is worked on a 16 inch circular needle to form a flared tube directions charts and written in english and french **pattern had been test knitted** **you need the acrobat reader to donwload the file you can donwload and install acrobat ** here 1 **** 1 http //get adobe com/reader/
